abilities.name: Primal Vibes
abilities.effect: As long as Cradily ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play a Pokémon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Eerie Light
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Acidic Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned and Burned.
